skill_precedence.description: Defines the priority order for skill resolution when multiple workspace folders contain skills with the same name.

order.label: Project-specific skills
order.description: Skills defined in the active project repository (skills/ or .ai/skills/). Always highest priority.

order.label: Other open workspace libraries
order.description: Skills from other non-ai_agent repositories open in the workspace. Override the personal library.

order.label: This library (ai_agent)
order.description: General-purpose personal skill library. Used as fallback when no higher-priority source provides the skill.

skill_precedence.note: When a higher-priority source defines a same-named skill, it fully replaces the lower-priority version. Skills unique to this library remain available regardless.
